name: Paperback
tagline:
An ad-free manga reader for iOS and iPadOS.

Package uses wget, python 3, appsync, and appinst to update and install the app. To update the app, simply reinstall this package.

Add this repo if you are having dependency issues: <https://cydia.akemi.ai/>

changelog.changes: Updated package to auto retrieve ipa and install

name: Mangasoup
tagline:
A simple Manga Reading App.

With over 40 different sources, MangaDex implementation, Reverse Image Search, MAL Tracking, Comments, and much more!

Package uses appsync and appinst to install the app.

Add this repo if you are having dependency issues: <https://cydia.akemi.ai/>

name: NineAnimator Nightly
tagline:
Nightly build of NineAnimator. May be unstable.

Package uses wget, python 3, unzip, zip, link identity editor, appsync, and appinst to update and install the app. To update the app simply reinstall this package. No data should be lost, but... resigning the ipa with ldid may break downloads, notifications, and icon switching.

Add this repo if you are having dependency issues: <https://cydia.akemi.ai/>

maintainer.name: Marcus, Uttiya, and others behind the scenes

pre_dependencies: wget, python3, ldid, net.angelxwind.appsyncunified, com.linusyang.appinst, unzip, zip

changelog.changes: Added sorting button, but back to larger app size.
Overhauled installation method. Make backup before updating, but hey it's the nightly version, so if data loss occurs, it's not my problem.
Added apt autoremove to postrm script.
Reverted postrm script as it was causing issues.

name: NineAnimator
tagline:
An elegant way of discovering anime on iOS.

Package uses appsync and appinst to install the app. This is the stable version with working downloads and such.

Add this repo if you are having dependency issues: <https://cydia.akemi.ai/>

maintainer.name: Marcus, Uttiya, and others behind the scenes

changelog.changes: Fixed up stable build of NineAnimator. *Uses a nightly version of the app bcuz I'm too lazy to make a new one, but hey twist works so thats a plus.
Added apt autoremove to postrm script.
Reverted postrm script as it was causing issues.
Add new sources, servers, and remove broken soruces. Also bug fixes and improvements.
